CustomField.description: Active: This status is used when the donor has started making payments towards their pledged amount, and the recurring donation is ongoing. Pending: his status is used when a donor has committed to a recurring donation, but the first payment has not yet been received. Completed: This status is used when the donor has fulfilled their total pledged amount, and the recurring donation is complete Cancelled: This status is used when a recurring donation has been cancelled for any reason, and no additional payments will be made.
CustomField.label: Status
